Extensions.​Color

Color related functions and metatable extensions.

Functions
ColorToHex
function ColorToHex(
color,
alpha
)

Returns the hexidecimal color string for a color object. This will be in the format #RRGGBB or #RRGGBBAA depending on the value of the second argument.

Parameters
Color color

The color to format.

bool? alpha

Whether to include the alpha in the output. Default: false

Returns
string

The hex string.

See Also

HexToColor

GetHex

HexToColor
function HexToColor(
hex
)

Translates a hex string to a color object. This handles the following formats: #RGB #RGBA #RRGGBB #RRGGBBAA

Parameters
string hex

The hex string to parse.

Returns
Color

The resulting color or nil if an invalid format was passed.

See Also

ColorToHex

NamedColor
function NamedColor(
name,
alpha
)

Creates a new color based off of a named color from the CSS color specification.

Parameters
string name

The case-insensitive name of a color.

number? alpha

The alpha value to assign to the color. Default: 255

Returns
Color

The corresponding color, or `nil` if no matches were found.

Fixes
HSVToColor
function HSVToColor(
hue,
saturation,
value
)

HSVToColor now returns a color with the correct metatable set.

HSLToColor
function HSLToColor(
hue,
saturation,
lightness
)

HSLToColor now returns a color with the correct metatable set.

Methods
GetHex
function meta:GetHex(
alpha
)

Returns the hexidecimal color string for this color object.

Parameters
bool? alpha

Whether to include the alpha in the output. Default: false

Returns
string

The hex string.

See Also

ColorToHex

GetInverted
function meta:GetInverted()

Returns an inverted version of this color.

Returns
Color

A copy of the color with it's R G and B values inverted.
